history.proof: intros a b. induction a as [|x xs IH]. - simpl. apply le_0_n. - simpl. apply max_lub. + srun best use: le_max_l. + srun best use: le_max_r, Nat.le_trans unfold: app, fold_right.

original: intros a b. induction a as [|x xs IH]. - simpl. apply le_0_n. - simpl. apply le_max.
